original_text: And all the army of the Chaldeans, who were with the captain of the guard, broke down all the walls around Jerusalem.
korean_text: 사령관을 따르는 갈대아 사람의 모든 군대가 예루살렘 사면 성벽을 헐었더라

sentences.original_text: And all the army of the Chaldeans
who were with the captain of the guard
broke down all the walls around Jerusalem
